reviewText: What is there not to like about this duo?????? Just as expected!
Two great movies goodfellas is by far the best movie ever love it
These are two of my all time favorite movies...  I had to have them on Blu-Ray.  The quality is very good and I am glad to have them in my collection!
Always wanted these movies on blu-ray!
Cannot beat the price for these 2 classics

Goodfellas is a classic and Heat has a lot of action, Joe Pesci likes to amuse people but don't ask him to shine your shoes.

Goodfellas picture quality and audio quality are good, the dialogue is clear at moderate volume.

Heat has excellent picture quality but the audio sucks, I was expecting more since it is True HD. The dialogue is hard to hear unless you turn the volume way up, then in the next scene a helicopter will blow up your subwoofer. I was constantly turning the volume up and down through the movie.
Awesome set of movies for great price...Amazon rocks

2 GOAT movies in the same case and in Blu-ray what's not to love. The bank robbery scene in HEAT is the best scene in movie history, and Goodfellas is only the best movie ever made puts The Godfather to shame.
